TopicTitle: Pendulum of POWER!!!!! (or what i did while waiting for pizza)

Articles.Content:
Ok so maybe the title is a bit over the top for this little experiment i ran while waiting for pizza to cook, but it was fun and i want to share it with all my kerbaling buddies.

So watch it and please feel part of this big thing we call teh internet
oh no kerbaling buddies even want to insult be about it.. Dunno why you would insult but no positives are coming so maybe it deserves derision
I dig it. An interesting concept. And it seems like it should be so simple, yes? But NO! NOT SIMPLE! DEATH TO KERBALS..... or something like that. Fun stuff.
Im making a rover that does that.

If you get TT's Modular Multiwheels mod, it has a part called a Ball Bearing. It's just a free-spinning rotating joint. It makes a great pivot point for spinning arms. I use it in all my Kerbal trebuchets .
